title: On Stage: Ukulele Getaway In Florida
teaser: In this week's installment of our "On Stage" series, we look at the Tampa Bay Ukulele Getaway in Clearwater, Florida.
contentencoded:
In this week’s installment of our “On Stage” series, we look at the Tampa Bay Ukulele Getaway in Clearwater, Florida. It includes performances, workshops and a luau.

Here & Now‘s Sacha Pfeiffer speaks with Steve Boisen, who founded the festival, which is now in its fifth year. He plays the ukulele and he’s also a bass musician.

  • See more in our On Stage series

Guest

  • Steve Boisen, founder of the Tampa Bay Ukulele Getaway festival.
